languages.text: {n}Друкари оглядывается с недоброй ухмылкой.{/n} "Заставлять меня скучать в окружении напуганной добычи, которой полнится этот замок — крайне глупая затея..."
{n}Marazhai looks around with an ominous grin.{/n} "Letting me get bored while I am surrounded by all the frightened prey swarming within this castle is most unwise..."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари оглядывается с недоброй ухмылкой.{/n} "Заставлять меня скучать в окружении напуганной добычи, которой полнится этот замок — крайне глупая затея..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai looks around with an ominous grin.{/n} "Making me bored when I am surrounded by the frightened prey swarming within this castle is most unwise..."
{n}Marazhai looks around with an ominous grin.{/n} "Letting me get bored while I am surrounded by all the frightened prey swarming within this castle is most unwise..."
{n}The Drukhari observes the cowering humans with a wicked smirk.{/n} "I love it when an excuse to wreak bloody carnage falls into my lap..."
{n}Marazhai looks around with an ominous grin.{/n} "Letting me get bored while I am surrounded by all the frightened prey swarming within this castle is most unwise..."
{n}Marazhai looks around with an ominous grin.{/n} "Letting me get bored while I am surrounded by all the frightened prey swarming within this castle is most unwise..."

{n}Marazhai looks around with an ominous grin.{/n} "Letting me get bored while I am surrounded by all the frightened prey swarming within this castle is most unwise..."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋环顾四周，脸上挂着不祥的笑容。{/n}“这座城堡里到处都是受惊的猎物。要是这种时候让我感到无聊，恐怕就不太明智了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks around with an ominous grin.{/n} "Letting me get bored while I am surrounded by all the frightened prey swarming within this castle is most unwise..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋环顾四周，脸上挂着不祥的笑容。{/n}“这座城堡里到处都是受惊的猎物。要是这种时候让我感到无聊，恐怕就不太明智了……”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mira a su alrededor con una sonrisa siniestra.{/n} «Dejar que me aburra cuando estoy rodeado por presas asustadas en este castillo no es una decisión sabia...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks around with an ominous grin.{/n} "Letting me get bored while I am surrounded by all the frightened prey swarming within this castle is most unwise..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mira a su alrededor con una sonrisa siniestra.{/n} «Dejar que me aburra cuando estoy rodeado por presas asustadas en este castillo no es una decisión sabia...».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, uğursuz bir gülümseme takınarak etrafa bakınıyor.{/n} "Bu kalede korkmuş avların arasındayken canımın sıkılması pek akıllıca olmaz..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks around with an ominous grin.{/n} "Letting me get bored while I am surrounded by all the frightened prey swarming within this castle is most unwise..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, uğursuz bir gülümseme takınarak etrafa bakınıyor.{/n} "Bu kalede korkmuş avların arasındayken canımın sıkılması pek akıllıca olmaz..."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは不気味な笑みを浮かべながら周囲を見回した。{/n}「この城の中にひしめく怯えた獲物どもに囲まれたまま、俺を退屈させるとは…実に愚かだな…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks around with an ominous grin.{/n} "Letting me get bored while I am surrounded by all the frightened prey swarming within this castle is most unwise..."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは不気味な笑みを浮かべながら周囲を見回した。{/n}「この城の中にひしめく怯えた獲物どもに囲まれたまま、俺を退屈させるとは…実に愚かだな…」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai regarde autour de lui, un sourire carnassier dansant sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Il n'est pas très avisé de me laisser m'ennuyer ainsi alors que ce château grouille de proies terrifiées... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks around with an ominous grin.{/n} "Letting me get bored while I am surrounded by all the frightened prey swarming within this castle is most unwise..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai regarde autour de lui, un sourire carnassier dansant sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Il n'est pas très avisé de me laisser m'ennuyer ainsi alors que ce château grouille de proies terrifiées... »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sieht sich mit einem unheilvollen Grinsen um.{/n} "Mich zu langweilen, während ich von all den verängstigten Schafen in dieser Burg umgeben bin, ist ausgesprochen unklug ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks around with an ominous grin.{/n} "Letting me get bored while I am surrounded by all the frightened prey swarming within this castle is most unwise..."
